name: Argaut XDBAudit
short_description: Argaut XDBAudit 1.8.3 scans corporate networks for Oracle and Microsoft SQL Server databases, collecting usage statistics and license related inventory audit information, including infrastructural metadata relating to capacity and performance metrics.
